content.p: Sec. 19.59.002. Penalties for AS 19.05  19.25. A person who violates a provision of AS 19.05  AS 19.25 , other than a provision of AS 19.25.080  19.25.180, is guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction is punishable by a fine of not less than $10 nor more than $500, or by imprisonment in jail for a period not to exceed one year, or by both.
